text: khanditavagiyu, visvasigalu, valasigaru mattu tam'ma sampattugalondige hagu tam'ma jivagalondige allahana margadalli horadidavaru, asraya odagisidavaru mattu neravadavaru – avare paraspara aptamitraru. Innu, visvasigalagiddaru valase hogadavaru – valase hoguva tanaka avara jote nimage yava nantu illa. Innu avaru dharmada visayadalli nim'ma neravu bayasidare, neravu niduvudu nim'ma kartavyavagide – adare, yava janangada hagu nim'ma naduve kararu ideyo avara virud'dhavalla. Nivu maduttiruva ellavannu allahanu noduttiddane
